name: Easiest Layer Dip
author: ambergetSHI
summary: I came up with this while on a limited budget and craving a layer dip sans guacamole, lettuce, olives, etc. Super easy and totally delicious!
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) jar salsa (such as Newman's Own® medium or hot)
2 cups shredded Mexican-style cheese blend, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix refried beans with   mix in a bowl; spread mixture into the bottom of an 8x8-inch glass baking dish
Spread sour cream over the refried beans; spread salsa over the sour cream
Bake in preheated oven until cheese is melted but not bubbling, 6 to 10 minutes
